programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: The line between dreams and reality become increasingly blurred after a womanizing playboy is nearly killed by a jilted lover in Spanish director Alejandro Amenabar's masterful sophomore effort Abre Los Ojos (Open Your Eyes). It would seem as if Cesar (Eduardo Noriega) has it all. Handsome, charming, and with money to burn, he can get any girl he wants, and usually does so on a nightly basis. Following a birthday party in which he chats up Sofia (Penelope Cruz), the date of his best friend Pelayo (Fele Martinez), Cesar is plunged headfirst into a nightmare world when jealous former lover Nuria (Najwa Nimri) swallows a handful of pills and sends her car careening into a cement wall with the terrified playboy as her hapless passenger. With his formerly strikingly handsome face now twisted into a hideous mass of scarred flesh, Cesar's ugly emotions are now externalized for all to see. Pining for a plastic-surgery miracle to return him to his former glory so that he can seek out Sofia and take a chance at real love, he is pleasantly surprised when the doctors make a breakthrough and Sofia accepts him back into her life. Although all seems perfect for the moment, the formerly soulless player finds that this is only the beginning of his increasingly disturbing journey. Why is Sofia changing appearance and turning into Nuria periodically? And why won't the police and his psychiatrist believe Cesar's desperate attempts to rationalize a world that is growing increasingly surreal? Could it have something to do with a doctor Cesar has seen on television who keeps appearing and attempting to help him out of his nightmare? Peeling away at the layers of his subconscious, Cesar begins to realize that reality is no more than a state of mind, and that in order to get his life back he may be forced to take unthinkable measures

programme.title: Nurse Jackie

programme.desc: Kristen Stewart and Charlize Theron star in Rupert Sanders' directorial debut, a dark reworking of the classic fairy tale. The beautiful Queen Ravenna is an evil sorceress who seized the throne by killing the widowed King Magnus on their wedding night. Ravenna's astonishing looks are maintained solely at a terrible cost to the realm's maidens; and when she discovers the beating heart of her long-imprisoned stepdaughter Snow White will grant her eternal pulchritude, the princess's days are numbered. But Snow White is now a strong, capable young woman, and she flees to the near-impenetrable Dark Forest, where Ravenna's black arts are impotent. So the queen dispatches The Huntsman to bring Snow White to her fate. However, he switches allegiance and joins forces with Snow White, Prince William and eight dwarves to set out to end Ravenna's cruel reign. But there will be bloody battles and much potent magic to overcome before that is possible..

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Mild-mannered married couple Phil and Claire steal a dinner reservation, which leads to a case of mistaken identity in this hilarious, action-packed romp. programme.title: Moms' Night Out
programme.desc: A group of exhausted mothers venture into the city for a rare night out on the town, but their carefree evening without the kids doesn't go quite as planned

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Tina Fey and Steve Carell star in Shawn Levy's chase comedy. Phil and Claire Foster feel their marriage has gone a tad stale and decide to pep it up by going out on a date, just like they used to do, before the kids and the mortgage and rest of life's inevitable distractions got in the way. In principal it's a good idea, but their first mistake is to attempt entry into one of Manhattan's swankiest restaurants without a reservation. Their second is far more serious: they bluff their way in, pretending to be a couple who have failed to show up for their table. Unfortunately for the Fosters, the absent diners have serious gangland connections. Even more unfortunately, the people whose identities they've adopted are due to be silenced forever by Mob hitmen. Cue a tightly plotted, gag-packed, headlong flight for survival, which has distinct echoes of the classics of the 40s screwball genre. And keep an eye out for memorable cameos from Mark Wahlberg and James Franco

programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds is the eponymous hero in Walter Becker's comedy, now in his seventh year at college whose mission in life is to help all the undergrads have a good time (and in the case of the girls, join him in bed). Then his father withdraws his funding and our hero is forced to earn his money organising pay parties. So successful are they, the college paper gets interested and if his secret gets out, he'll be expelled. Can he persuade reporter Tara Reid that what he does serves a useful purpose on campus?

programme.title: Out on a Limb
programme.desc: Manhattan stockbroker Bill Campbell is just about to sew up the biggest deal of his life when he gets a call from his younger sister, who reckons that her stepfather is involved in something crooked. So on his way to complete the multi-million dollar deal, Bill agrees to stop by in the backward town of Buzzsaw to comfort his sister. But then things start to go wrong - he's kidnapped by an armed redhead named Sally, who deprives him of his clothes, his car and, most crucially, the wallet which contains the 'phone number Bill needs to finish his business transaction. Now he has just 24 hours to get his possessions back before his chances of becoming rich and famous evaporate forever. And in the slow-paced, slow-witted town of Buzzsaw, help is not exactly in abundance!

programme.title: Flash of Genius

A police sergeant visits a remote island off the Washington coast to search for a missing girl, but begins to fear for her safety when he finds the local community in thrall to paganism and mysterious beliefs. The sergeant's unease grows when the islanders deny the girl's existence and attempt to obstruct his investigation

programme.desc: In this galvanizing feminist drama, a working-class laundress (Carey Mulligan) in 19th century London becomes radicalized when she meets a brave cadre of women organizing to obtain the vote

programme.desc: A scientist embarks upon a time-travelling adventure, experiencing the battles and destruction of several world wars before settling in a seemingly Edenic community in 802,701 AD. But while the citizens' idyllic existence is somewhat vacuous, with little independence or individual thought, a second community - a group of underground cannibals - steals his time machine, leaving him trapped in their dangerous world

programme.title: American Pie 2

After their first year of college, Jim (Jason Biggs) and his randy pals rent a beach house for summer fun and games. When Jim learns that gorgeous exchange student Nadia (Shannon Elizabeth) will be paying a visit, he decides to get some quick lessons in love. Alyson Hannigan, Chris Klein

programme.title: MI-5
programme.desc: In this thrilling spy film, Will Holloway, a former MI-5 agent, is forced to partner with Harry Pearce, the man decommissioned him, to apprehend a terrorist who escaped during routine prisoner transport and prevent an attack on the city of London. Based on a British televison series "Spooks."

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of professional climbers successfully scale Mount Everest only to be faced with tragedy when a monster storm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent. Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin, Jason Clarke, and John Hawkes co-star. Directed by Baltasar Kormakur (2 Guns)

programme.title: Making of 'Everest'
programme.desc: A look at "Everest," a 2016 drama based on the attempts by two groups to climb Mount Everest in 1996. The film stars Jason Clarke, Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin and Robin Wright, and is directed by Baltasar Kormákur

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: Paul Thomas Anderson adapts Thomas Pynchon's celebrated detective novel in this Annapurna Pictures production. Joaquin Phoenix stars as Larry "Doc" Sportello, a pot-smoking private eye at the tail end of the psychedelic '60s who investigates a kidnapping case involving his old flame Shasta Fay Hepworth (Katherine Waterston) and her missing sugar daddy Mickey Wolfmann (Eric Roberts), a powerful real-estate mogul. In the course of his investigation Doc butts heads with Lt. Det. Christian F. "Bigfoot" Bjornsen (Josh Brolin), a part-time actor with a palpable distain for the free-love generation, and a reputation for committing civil-rights violations. Later, as clues to Wolfmann's disappearance begin to suggest a conspiracy involving the FBI and a mysterious underworld syndicate known as the Golden Fang, Doc seeks the help of his lawyer Sauncho Smilax, Esq. (Benicio Del Toro) and Deputy D.A. Penny Kimball (Reese Witherspoon). Meanwhile, Doc also agrees to search for Coy Harlingen (Owen Wilson), a reportedly deceased saxophone player who may not be as dead as rumors suggest, and who seems somehow tied to the ongoing Wolfmann investigation. Martin Short, Jena Malone, and Joanna Newsom co-star

programme.title: How to Let Go of the World and Love All the Things Climate Can't Change

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: In this Academy Award-nominated sci-fi action feature starring Shia LaBeouf, Tyrese Gibson, and John Voight, the interstellar battle between the Autobots and Decepticons rains destruction down on planet Earth. Both the Autobots and the Decepticons are fighting for the sole access to a talisman known as the Allspark, a cube with the capacity to grant infinite power to whoever possesses it. If the Autobots don't find it first, the Earth will be enslaved or destroyed by the evil Decepticons. No one knows where the cube is, but the information may be stored in the most unlikely of sources, as a gangly young Earthling named Sam Witwicky (LaBeouf), who's just picked up his first car, will soon find out

programme.desc: Ernest gets into deep trouble when he decides to build a treehouse for the neighborhood kid and accidentally digs up an ugly, evil-tempered troll who hates all children and shows it by promptly turning the five kids helping Ernest into wooden sculptures

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Four mates tackle love, sex and marriage in this African-American comedy. Derrick's already married, but the sex is boring. Doc Jackson dreams about a bride aiming a gun at him. Lawyer Brian can't trust women, while muscular Terry likes girls too much to pick just one

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: A bisexual woman from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed. Meanwhile, she stages silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Fast and furious comedy western about a desperate race against time to foil a plot to assassinate the President of the USA. Two government agents find themselves up against a sinister criminal mastermind with a penchant for inventing extremely lethal devices. To thwart the forces of evil, they will need to be quite inventive themselves

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: A hilariously criminal Santa finds a measure of holiday redemption when he befriends a troubled kid. The traditional Christmas tale will never be the same after this cleverly twisted, merrily irreverent story of a Santa so bad that he's funny. Billy Bob Thornton stars (in a Golden Globe-nominated role) as Willie T. Stokes, a washed-up, wisecracking department store Santa who is only in the business for the criminal opportunities. Every Christmas Eve this Santa and his ingenious Elf' Willie's midget partner-in-crime Marcus (Tony Cox), crack the store safe and make off with their own holiday stash. But this year Santa and his Elf find their annual heist endangered by a pesky store manager (John Ritter), a savvy mall detective (Bernie Mac), a sexy Santa fan (Lauren Graham) and an 8-year-old misfit (Brett Kelly) who decides to believe that Willie: intoxicated, acid-tongued and felonious as he is, is the real Santa

programme.title: Making of 'Trainwreck'
programme.desc: A look at "Trainwreck," a 2015 comedy about a commitment-phobic woman who finds herself falling for the subject of an article she's writing for a men's magazine. The film stars Amy Schumer, Bill Hader and Tilda Swinton, and is written by Schumer and directed by Judd Apatow

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: The 2016 Summer Olympics and doping in sports; and the United Kingdom's vote to leave the European Union are discussed

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: The thirty-something owner of a used-record store takes stock of his sorry excuse for a love life after his latest girlfriend leaves him

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Republican consultant Frank Luntz and actor Viggo Mortensen are the interview guests. The panelists are writer Jelani Cobb, political commentator S.E. Cupp and former New York governor Eliot Spitzer

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: The Principal. In the premiere of this comedy about a power struggle between two high-school administrators who are vying for the top job, Vice Principals Neal Gamby and Lee Russell jockey for position when Principal Welles retires

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Retired male stripper Magic Mike (Channing Tatum) decides to help his friends put on one last show, as the crew embark on a road trip to Myrtle Beach to perform at an exotic-dance convention. Along the way, they brighten the lives of several women, including an aspiring photographer (Amber Heard) and a diva (Jada Pinkett Smith) from Mike's past

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: A bisexual woman from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed. Meanwhile, she stages silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Every December, safecracker Willie takes a job as a department store Santa. Every Christmas Eve, he robs the store and makes off with a lucrative haul. But is his boozy lifestyle killing his criminal record?

programme.title: Tracy Morgan: Black and Blue
programme.desc: Controversial stand-up and sitcom star Tracy Morgan performs his typically blunt yet hysterical set before an adoring crowd at the historic Apollo theater

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Four mates tackle love, sex and marriage in this African-American comedy. Derrick's already married, but the sex is boring. Doc Jackson dreams about a bride aiming a gun at him. Lawyer Brian can't trust women, while muscular Terry likes girls too much to pick just one

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: The residents of a rural mining town discover that a chemical spill has caused hundreds of spiders to mutate to monumental proportions. David Arquette and Scarlet Johansson star. (2002)

programme.title: The Ladies' Man
programme.desc: Sight gags are the show as Jerry Lewis clowns it up as a houseboy in a women's boardinghouse. Helen Welenmelon: Helen Traubel. Fay: Pat Stanley. Katie: Kathleen Freeman. Directed by Lewis

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: Career woman Joy heads off to Las Vegas to cheer herself up after being very publicly dumped by her boyfriend. Fate leads her to meeting amiable slacker Jack and the new friends soon enjoy a boozy evening. Later that evening, rather drunk, they end up getting hitched. As reality dawns the next morning, the duo plan to divorce as quickly as they married. But Jack wins a massive amount of money, after putting one of Joy's coins in a slot machine. Their squabble over the money leads to a judge freezing the assets and sentencing them to make a go of their marriage - for at least six months. Tom Vaughan's romantic comedy also stars Queen Latifah as the marriage guidance expert who tries to keep the couple together

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: When a Miami-mob loan shark is sent to LA to collect a debt from a producer of low-budget films, he pitches him an idea for a picture instead of breaking his legs. Pretty soon the shark finds himself in his element with criminal predators of the Hollywood variety. This clever adaptation of Elmore Leonard's novel features cameos from Harvey Keitel and Bette Midler, and a sparkling score from John Lurie

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: All-star heist sequel. The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot. Director: Steven Soderbergh (Conclusion of tonight's film)

programme.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
programme.desc: The local sherrif joins the fight to save the Chicken Ranch brothel

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: Comedy about two very different black men working their way up the corporate ladder. Waymon (Joseph C Phillips) is an Ivy League graduate who is now working his way up the ranks of a major New York company. He befriends Bobby (Tommy Davidson), who works in the company's post room, although the pair have very little in common. When Waymon first notices the stunning Natalie (Halle Berry), he begins to realise that Bobby - who is a friend of hers - could be of some use to him after all

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: Action-packed teen comedy sequel in which a group of friends are reunited after their freshman year of college and embark upon a series of comical adventures when they rent a summer house on Lake Michigan

programme.title: Tig Notaro: Boyish Girl Interrupted
programme.desc: Comedian Tig Notaro performs at the Wilbur Theatre in Boston. Topics include doing shows in Las Vegas; introducing her fiancée to her family in Mississippi; TSA screenings; small planes; Santa Claus; and misleading text messages. Taped May 31, 2015

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: The directors of Scary, Date and Epic Movie get their mickey-taking mitts on Frank Miller's 300. Cue merciless mockery Spartan-style

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Hansel and Gretel. Happily Ever After introduces this ethnically diverse version of a classic tale. When Hanselito and Gretelita become lost in a tropical wilderness, they pool their wits to find shelter. When it turns out the house made of candy is home to a witch, the two manage to escape by working together. The Hispanic characters guarantee a worldwide audience for this oft-told tale

programme.desc: Some years after he discovered that he could converse with the animals, Dr Doolittle finds that his abilities bring a whole new set of problems - not least overwork which adds to his growing detachment from his family

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: The Grinch, a foul-tempered green and hairy creature who lives on Mount Crumpit, hates Christmas almost as much as he hates the residents of Whoville, the town at the bottom of his mountain. One night he decides to steal Christmas away from the Whos by taking all their decorations, presents and Christmassy things. However, he soon learns a valuable lesson about the true spirit of the festive season. An adaptation of the 'How The Grinch Stole Christmas' by Dr. Seuss

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: Barry B. Benson, a bee who has just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue us

programme.title: Like Mike 2: Streetball
programme.desc: Forget about the arena, because in this sequel to the 2002 slam-dunk basketball hit Like Mike, it's all about the quest to become the King of Concrete. Jerome Jenkins Jr. is a pint-sized street-ball player with larger-than-life dreams of dominating the open-air court. Vertically challenged, uncoordinated, and decidedly lacking in speed, Jerome fails to earn the respect of his peers on the court until he discovers a mysterious pair of sneakers that instil him with the power to make his dreams of winning become reality

programme.desc: A dog and a cat give vocabulary lessons in English and Spanish

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: After a disastrous summer, Harry returns to begin his fifth year at Hogwarts, one of the toughest he will ever have. A few group of students and parents believe him or Dumbledore that Voldemort is really back, and a never-ending series of articles states that they are insane. On top of that, Dolores Umbridge, the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher, proves to be the nastiest person Harry has ever encountered

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Animated adventure. A penguin is cast out by his colony because he is unable to sing, but his tap-dancing skills and new friends enable him to make a triumphant return. Featuring the voices of Elijah Wood, Brittany Murphy, Robin Williams, Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman

programme.title: The Great Outdoors
programme.desc: Chet is looking forward to his holiday. He's booked a lakeside house for the family, but he never counted on irritating brother-in-law Roman showing up too

programme.title: The Crew
programme.desc: In this dark comedy, a group of retirees wants to save their homes -- but they're not typical senior citizens trying to make the most of their Social Security checks. Four aging former mobsters -- Joey "Bats" Pistella (Burt Reynolds), Bobby Bartellemeo (Richard Dreyfuss), Mike the Brick (Dan Hedaya), and Tony "The Mouth" Donato (Seymour Cassel) -- live in the same rundown Miami apartment complex, the Raj Mahal. New owners hope to clear out the current tenants and replace them with a younger, more lucrative clientele. But the veteran gangsters don't want to move, so to scrape up the extra rent money, they take a job executing the father of a Miami mob boss. They happen to know he's already dead, so all they have to do is make it look like they did the hit. Their problems start when loudmouthed ladies' man Tony tells too much to Ferris (Jennifer Tilly), a stripper, and soon she's talked him into murdering her mother (Lainie Kazan) in exchange for her silence. The Crew also features Carrie-Anne Moss as a detective and Jeremy Piven as a mob kingpin out to avenge his father's death

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Evan Baxter is a rising congressman with a bright future and his goal to change the world. God hears this message and decides to give him a hand. Delivering Evan the material and the animals, he sets Evan the task of building an ark. After trying to ignore God as much as possible, Evan eventually goes ahead with the plan, even if the other Congressmen and his family thinks he's mad

programme.title: Chimps: So Like Us
programme.desc: As the world's foremost authority on chimpanzees, Jane Goodall is the ideal guide in this heartwarming documentary. The remarkable similarity between humans and chimpanzees is apparent from the opening of the film in the lush forest on the shores of Lake Tanganyika. Here the chimpanzees live -- much like humans -- in family units, make tools, and express complex emotions. Love, jealousy, friendship, and war are all presented, and further blur the distinctions between human and animal. In contrast, the film reveals the shocking conditions under which chimps suffer in research labs. Produced for HBO, Chimps is informative and beautiful, while also being quite strong in its conviction that chimpanzees deserve to live freely in their natural habitat

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek and Fiona's (Mike Myers and Cameron Diaz, respectively) fairy-tale wedding has gone off without a hitch, yet just as the beaming newlyweds prepare to enjoy their blissful "happily ever after," the sudden death of King Harold (John Cleese) finds everyone's favorite ornery ogre being reluctantly fitted for the royal crown. Troubled to learn that not only will he be compelled to rule Far Far Away, but that he and Fiona are also expecting a little ogre, Shrek determines to track down his new bride's rebellious cousin, Artie (Justin Timberlake) -- the one true heir to the throne -- in order to focus on fatherhood without the added distraction of having to preside over the kingdom. As Shrek sets out with faithful companions Donkey (Eddie Murphy) and Puss in Boots (Antonio Banderas) to locate the medieval high-school slacker and bring him back to become the reigning sovereign of Far Far Away, handsome snake Prince Charming (Rupert Everett) slithers back to the castle in the company of the dreaded Captain Hook (Ian McShane) to stage a diabolically timed coup and assume control of the throne. Now, as Shrek, Donkey, and Puss in Boots do their best to wrangle up the feisty Artie, Fiona must enlist the aid of fighting princesses Snow White (Amy Poehler), Sleeping Beauty (Cheri Oteri), Rapunzel (Maya Rudolph), and Cinderella (Amy Sedaris) to barricade the castle and fend off Prince Charming's invading army of fairy-tale villains until her beloved husband can return with the cavalry to save the day

programme.title: Jonas Brothers: The Concert Experience
programme.desc: The Jonas Brothers burn up the big screen in this 3-D rockumentary chronicling their "Burning Up" concert tour. The film features exclusive behind-the-scenes footage, a brand-new song, and special guest performances by Taylor Swift and Demi Lovato. Directed by Bruce Hendricks ("Hannah Montana/Miley Cyrus: Best of Both Worlds Concert")

programme.title: Hoot
programme.desc: Three kids have an unexpected adventure as they try to protect some rare birds in this comedy drama based on a book for young adults by Carl Hiaasen. Roy Eberhardt (Logan Lerman) is a 14-year-old boy whose family has moved so often he's literally lost count of the number of times he's changed schools in the last ten years. Roy ought to be used to being the new kid at school by now, but making the switch from the big sky of Montana to the Gulf Coast of Florida proves to be a major challenge. While Roy quickly becomes the target of school bully Dana Matherson (Eric Phillips), he's befriended by Beatrice Leep (Brie Larson), a spunky girl with enough nerve to stand up to Dana, and her brother Mullet Fingers (Cody Linley). Beatrice and Mullet share their big secret with Roy -- they have a hidden hideaway where they look after a flock of wild owls. The owls in question are on the endangered species list, but that's of little concern to Chuck Muckle (Clark Gregg), a top executive from the Mother Paula's All-American Pancake House chain, who is planning to build a new restaurant in the hollow where the owls nest. Roy, Beatrice, and Mullet are determined to find a way to save the owls, but Muckle and his right-hand man, Curly Brannitt (Tim Blake Nelson), are less interested in saving the birds than in turning a profit. The kids have a plan, however, and they uncover some evidence of interest to David Delinko (Luke Wilson), a well-meaning but slow-witted policeman investigating some dirty doings tied in to the pancake house. Hoot features a handful of new recordings from popular Florida musician Jimmy Buffett, who also helped produce the film

programme.title: Dolphin Tale 2
programme.desc: A group of sympathetic humans help a dolphin with a damaged tail in this sequel to the surprise 2011 hit, inspired by actual events

programme.title: Fathers' Day
programme.desc: A woman cons two old boyfriends into searching for her runaway son by convincing both that they are the boy's father

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Director Guy Ritchie brings the popular TV spy series to the big screen in this origin story. Set in the 1960s CIA agent Napoleon Solo (Henry Cavill) and KGB op Illya Kuryakin (Armie Hammer) pair up to stop an international criminal organization that is dealing in nuclear weapons and technology, which could upset the balance of power in the world. Cast includes Alicia Vikander, Elizabeth Debicki, Hugh Grant and Jared Harris

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: In this hilarious, offbeat detective story set in 1970 California, a drug-addled PI probes a conspiracy involving his ex-flame and her married, real-estate-developer boyfriend. Along the way, various eccentric characters complicate the investigation

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved

programme.title: Grilled
programme.desc: A pair of struggling meat salesmen get caught up in a mob war while trying to close an important sale

programme.title: Slither
programme.desc: James Gunn's directorial debut is an enjoyable splatter/ monster/ horror movie which begins when a courting couple, seeking privacy in the woods near small town Wheelsy, come across a just-landed meteorite. In no time at all, he's transformed into a toothy squid-like killing creature, while she becomes the breeder of deadly blood-thirsty slugs. Dry-witted police chief Bill Pardy is soon on the case but his problems are compounded when the victims of the slugs start coming back to life as slaves of the aliens

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage hunts for a legendary treasure that's been hidden for centuries. Unfortunately, villain Sean Bean is after the loot too

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: This cartoon-like comedy tells the story of a convict and a cop who marry and then decide they need a baby, whatever what it takes

programme.title: American Splendor
programme.desc: Documentary footage, animation and the narrative combine in this wildly original comedy-drama about the cult comic-book writer Harvey Pekar (Paul Giamatti), whose "American Splendor" stories detail the banality of his ordinary life. The film captures the surly scribe's rise in the comic business, his relationship with his wife (Hope Davis) and his battle with cancer. Earl Billings

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy (Levi Miller) discovers his destiny as Peter Pan in this vividly realized fantasy, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard (Hugh Jackman) with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily (Rooney Mara). Directed by Joe Wright (Hanna) and Atonement). Cast includes Garrett Hedlund, Amanda Seyfried, Adeel Akhtar, Nonso Anozie and Kathy Burke

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Outcast Van Helsing is charged with a mission to go to the shadowy world of Transylvania and vanquish the evil Count Dracula. He joins forces with a beautiful woman descended from a powerful royal family, but finds that his goal of annihilating the enemy brings him face to face with his own past

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Synthetic drugs give a woman superhuman powers, which she uses to strike back against the Asian gangsters who kidnapped her and tried to use her as a mule. In time, her increased intelligence causes her to become disconnected from the rest of humanity

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage hunts for a legendary treasure that's been hidden for centuries. Unfortunately, villain Sean Bean is after the loot too

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Actors playing U.S. soldiers in a war movie run afoul of real-life drug traders in the Vietnamese jungle

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: This psychological thriller, based on true events, tells the story of a disgraced journalist (Jonah Hill) who's drawn into a cat-and-mouse game with an accused murderer (James Franco) who has assumed the journalists' identity

programme.title: The Wicker Man
programme.desc: A sheriff investigates a young girl's disappearance from a mysterious, isolated island in this eerie thriller starring Academy Award winners Nicolas Cage and Ellen Burstyn. Kate Beahan, Frances Conroy, Molly Parker, Leelee Sobieski. Directed by Neil LaBute

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: Unnatural Love. Jemaine dates an Australian woman, much to Bret's chagrin

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: Rousing sci-fi adventure about a time portal that provides a gateway into an alternate universe. A crack team of explorers, including an Egyptologist, embark on a journey into the unknown when they venture through the 'stargate'. Differences within the group pale into insignificance as the team confront the challenges before them

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, a.k.a Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop down in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Murray Takes It to the Next Level
programme.desc: Murray Takes It to the Next Level. Mel wants Bret to apologize for his behavior in a dream; Murray focuses on his personal relationship with the band. Jim Gaffigan guest stars

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy fashion magazine

programme.title: Trouble With the Curve
programme.desc: An aging baseball scout (Clint Eastwood) with failing sight hits the road with his estranged daughter (Amy Adams) to pursue a promising young ballplayer, and they learn just how much they have in common as they make their way from Georgia to North Carolina in this sports drama produced and directed by frequent Eastwood collaborator Robert Lorenz. For decades, Gus Lobel (Eastwood) has been one of the best scouts in Major League Baseball. But these days his eyes just aren't what they used to be, and as a phenomenal young batter enters the draft, the owners of the Atlanta Braves cast a shadow of doubt over Gus' judgment. Meanwhile, his daughter Mickey ( Adams) is an aspiring partner at a major Atlanta law firm. In the wake of his wife's death, Gus sent Mickey away, and their relationship has been strained ever since. But she knows a thing or two about baseball, and recognizing that her father's job is in jeopardy, she decides to help him -- even at the risk of derailing her own career. Now, throwing caution to the wind (and ignoring her gruff father's objections), Mickey joins Gus for a scouting trip that could keep him in the game until he's ready to retire, as well as repair a father/daughter relationship that once seemed all but lost. Justin Timberlake, John Goodman, Robert Patrick, and Matthew Lillard co-star

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels star as Lloyd and Harry, two friends who must overcome their complete stupidity, and the attentions of smarter criminals, to return a bag of cash to its rightful owner

programme.title: Friday Night Lights
programme.desc: The American dream, in the real-life story of a dream team of American... football, of course. Billy Bob Thornton plays Gary Gaines, a coach that began to train a team for a high school tournament and took it to the top. Set in a Texan town, dispirited by the recession, this film - by the actor and rising director, Peter Berg - covers not only the team's progress in the sport, but also the stories of immigrants and social problems surrounding the game and its main figures

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: The Principal. In the premiere of this comedy about a power struggle between two high-school administrators who are vying for the top job, Vice Principals Neal Gamby and Lee Russell jockey for position when Principal Welles retires

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: In this poignant romantic drama, a star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an aging man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy fashion magazine

programme.title: Making of 'Spy'
programme.desc: A look at "Spy," a 2015 comedy about a CIA analyst thrust into the line of duty to track down a ruthless arms dealer. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne, and is written and directed by Paul Feig

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: The sequel to the 2005 blockbuster FANTASTIC FOUR, RISE OF THE SILVER SURFER finds the Marvel superhero quartet of Reed Richards, Sue Storm, Johnny Storm, and Ben Grimm facing an extraterrestrial threat in the form of the title character, an enigmatic being whose presence on Earth could signal the planet's end

programme.title: Frailty
programme.desc: Actor Bill Paxton's directorial debut is a chilling, provocative and original thriller. Paxton plays a widowed blue-collar worker who one day has a revelation: he must destroy those revealed to him as demons. And so begin the serial killings of "God's Hand Killer" across Texas. But he also has two young sons, the younger of whom idolises him and believes in the cause, while his older brother is revolted but cannot bring himself to stop his father. Then, 20 years later, the elder son (now played by Matthew McConaughey) walks into a police station and finally confesses all to FBI agent (Powers Boothe). As he does, so a horrific tale unfolds in flashback

programme.title: Alpha Dog
programme.desc: A drama based on the life of Jesse James Hollywood, a drug dealer who became one of the youngest men ever to be on the FBI's most wanted list

programme.title: Making of 'Straight Outta Compton'
programme.desc: A look at "Straight Outta Compton," a 2015 drama that chronicles the history of the hip-hop group NWA in 1980s California. The film stars Jason Mitchell, Corey Hawkins, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Aldis Hodge and Neil Brown Jr., and is directed by F. Gary Gray

programme.title: The Namesake
programme.desc: American-born Gogol, the son of Indian immigrants, wants to fit in among his fellow New Yorkers, despite his family's unwillingness to let go of their traditional ways

programme.title: Joshua
programme.desc: In the frightmarish tradition of "The Bad Seed" and "The Omen" follows this chilling psychological thriller about a seemingly perfect 9-year-old son (Jacob Kogan) of Manhattan yuppies, and the alarming, diabolical disturbances that follow in his wake. Sam Rockwell and Vera Farmiga costar as the parents, who watch in horror as their charmed lives unravel. Directed by George Ratliff, who co-wrote the script with David Gilbert. Dallas Roberts, Celia Weston, Michael McKean, Nancy Giles

programme.title: Rocket Science
programme.desc: Coming-of-age saga examining the sometimes torturous, sometimes rewarding high-school experience. The extremely talented Reece Daniel Thompson portrays a stuttering teen who joins the school's debate squad and falls in love with a female teammate (Anna Kendrick). Written and directed by Jeffrey Blitz, who chronicled spelling-bee competitions in the documentary "Spellbound." Blitz also overcame his own teenage stuttering problem. The soundtrack features music by the Violent Femmes

programme.title: Citizen U.S.A.: A 50 State Road Trip
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi's patriotic travelogue crisscrosses the U.S. to attend naturalization ceremonies in all 50 states and listens to recent immigrants from around the world explain their decision to become American citizens. The film is inspired by the naturalization process experienced by Pelosi's Dutch-born husband, Michiel Vos

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an aging man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: In this high-octane thrill ride, a helicopter pilot races to rescue his daughter and estranged wife as a series of massive earthquakes devastate California. Meanwhile, a Cal Tech professor attempts to warn other citizens

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Face of the Franchise. In the Season 2 premiere, Spencer clashes with an old foe when he reluctantly agrees to be a guest on Jay Glazer's talk show, a mêlée that tarnishes his reputation and creates bad publicity for the company. Meanwhile, Ricky's blindsided by bad news before his 30th birthday party; and Charles enjoys being in the spotlight again

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Gina Norris is a long way from the Barbershop - she's moved from Chicago to Atlanta so her daughter can attend a prestigious music school, and she's made a name for herself at a posh salon with her cutting-edge hairstyles. But when her egotistical boss takes credit for her work, she leaves the salon with the shampoo girl in tow to open a shop of her own. Gina buys a rundown salon and inherits a motley group of headstrong stylists, a colorful clientele, and a sexy piano-playing electrician. It's a rocky road to fulfilling her dreams, but you can't keep a good woman down

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube stars in this slick comedy-drama about a day in the life of the cutups who work and hang out at a barbershop on Chicago's South Side. Cube plays Calvin Palmer, an entrepreneurial soul who inherits his father's struggling hair business. Unfortunately, Calvin doesn't want to be the head honcho, so he sells the shop to a local loan shark---a move that greatly upsets his regulars. Cedric the Entertainer

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: Remake of the post-apocalyptic action film, in which Max tries to escape the madness of the desert with a fellow rebel, and seek sanctuary

programme.title: Mapplethorpe: Look at the Pictures
programme.desc: This documentary profiles iconic and controversial photographer Robert Mapplethorpe via interviews with his family and lovers, examinations of his work and rediscovered footage of the late artist

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: A spellbinding fantasy about a financially strapped single mother who descends into a dark world in order to protect her family, while her son confronts the town bully and discovers a hidden utopia

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent has his hands full when a jet cargo of creepy-crawly critters is unleashed on passengers by a mob boss trying to do away with a murder witness

programme.title: Everybody's All-American
programme.desc: In 25 years of marriage, a football hero and a homecoming queen go from glory days to malaise over time as he struggles with his maturity and she does her best to keep in step with her husband's career and mood swings

programme.title: Before the Rains
programme.desc: In this steamy, sultry melodrama set in colonial India, ambitious English plantation owner Henry Moores (Linus Roache) has a forbidden affair with a beautiful local woman, Sajani (Nandita Das), while his wife is away on an extended trip. When she returns, Henry tries to break off the relationship. But Sajani has risked everything for her lover, and her anguished response to his betrayal sets off a chain reaction of devastating events. Rahul Bose, Jennifer Ehle, John Standing

programme.title: Kissing Jessica Stein
programme.desc: After a string of dates with the men from hell, Jessica Stein answers a lonely hearts ad placed by a woman who shares the same interests as her, hoping for companionship. But Helen has other ideas and Stein finds herself in a torrid affair in Charles Herman-Wurmfeld's romantic comedy

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends open themselves up to a terrifying ordeal when they attempt to summon spirits through a Ouija board

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Acting superstars Denzel Washington and Russell Crowe are captivating in this absorbing crime epic set in the early 1970s. Washington is real-life Harlem drug kingpin Frank Lucas, and Crowe plays Det. Richie Roberts, the N.Y. cop trying to nail him. A top-flight supporting cast is highlighted by Best Supporting Actress nominee Ruby Dee as Lucas's mother. Directed by Ridley Scott, from a script by Steven Zaillian

programme.title: Blood and Wine
programme.desc: Action-packed thriller about a crook who finds his crimes catching up with him. Alex Gates is a wine seller who juggles his wife Suzanne, stepson Jason and his mistress Gabriella while at the same time plotting fiendish robberies. His latest, the theft of a valuable diamond necklace with expert safe-cracker Victor Spansky, proves to be the last straw for Suzanne and Jason, who decide to leave Alex behind for good. There's just one problem: they have accidentally taken the stolen necklace with them, and now Alex and Victor will stop at nothing to get it back

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin team up to stop an international criminal organisation that is trafficking nuclear weapons and technology. Adaptation of the TV series of the same name

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: It's said that most American men think about sex once every two or three minutes, but this statistic would seriously underestimate the horniness of Jim (Jason Biggs), a high school senior in suburban Michigan. Jim is thoroughly obsessed with sex, a fact of which his parents become aware when they discover him performing the sin of Onan with a gym sock while watching scrambled pay-per-view porn. Jim's buddies Kevin (Thomas Ian Nicholas), Finch (Eddie Kaye Thomas), and Oz (Chris Klein) are no less anxious to relieve themselves of their virginity, so they all make a pledge: they will go to bed with a woman in the three weeks before senior prom or die trying. Kevin appears to have the advantage, since he already has a girlfriend, Vicky (Tara Reid), but before he ventures into the Final Frontier, Kevin is urged to consult "The Bible," a hand-written how-to manual possessing erotic wisdom passed down through the ages. Oz is a good-looking jock who is actually a nice guy -- which is part of the problem, since he has his heart set on a nice girl, Heather (Mena Suvari), who does not seem the type to leap into bed within 21 days. Finch has no immediate prospects, though Jessica (Natasha Lyonne) is in a position to know if those rumors about him are true. And Jim is a truly hopeless case -- after his attempted seduction of beautiful Czech exchange student Nadia (Shannon Elizabeth) turns out to be a disaster, he ends up going to the prom with Michelle (Alyson Hannigan), an annoyingly chatty band geek who does, however, have a fascinating story about a flute. American Pie was the directorial debut of Paul Weitz, who, along with his brother Chris Weitz (who served as producer), previously wrote several screenplays, including Antz and Madeline (where they presumably worked all their wholesome ideas out of their system)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: Juno may seem wise beyond her years, but after sleeping with classmate Bleeker, the pregnant teen quickly realises how little she really knows about life. Thankfully, Juno has been blessed with parents who trust their daughter's judgment, and a best friend named Leah, who's always willing to help out in a pinch

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: The extraordinary mathematical mind of John Forbes Nash Jr draws him into the world of Cold War spies. But how much of Nash's fearful work is a product of his paranoia? Compelling drama of a troubled and brilliant man

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin team up to stop an international criminal organisation that is trafficking nuclear weapons and technology. Adaptation of the TV series of the same name

programme.title: María y el araña
programme.desc: María es una chica de trece años que vive en una villa de emergencia de Buenos Aires junto a su abuela y el oscuro compañero de ésta. María conoce a un chico de 17 años que se gana la vida haciendo malabares disfrazado de Hombre Araña. Una relación amorosa empieza a surgir entre ellos y a medida que esto pasa se irán descubriendo los siniestros secretos de la vida de la joven. (cc)

programme.title: El adiós
programme.desc: Después de pasar años como empleada doméstica con la misma familia, Rosana tendrá que encargarse de los preparativos para el funeral de la matriarca de la casa. A pesar de haber querido mucho a la abuela fallecida, Rosana se verá relegada debido a su estatus de sirvienta. (cc)

programme.title: What to Watch - HBO Latino
programme.desc: Un espacio destinado para ver los avances de series, películas y shows especiales, emitidos por HBO Latino. (cc)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: (cc)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: La vidad de Tracy no está siendo lo emocionante que ella esperaba tras comenzar sus estudios universitarios en Nueva York. Todo esto cambia cuando conoce a la aventurera Brooke que, además, va a convertirse pronto en su hermanastra. (cc)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: En 1987, cinco jóvenes revolucionan la cultura popular utilizando el arma más poderosa que tenían: su música. Película biográfica sobre la banda estadounidense de rap N. W. A., que encendió una revolución social que aún hoy sigue reverberando. (cc)

programme.title: Capadocia
programme.desc: Capadocia, la nueva prisión, abre con mucha fanfarria, pero Teresa, quien debe decidir quién se transferirá, se preocupa que tanto las instalaciones como el personal no están listos. Entretanto, Federico busca desesperadamente a un inversionista y La Colombiana recuerda su pasado trágico que la condujo a la cárcel. (cc)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: En el estreno de la segunda temporada, Spencer se enfrenta con un viejo enemigo cuando accede a ser el invitado de un show y termina poniendo en peligro su reputación. Mientras tanto, Ricky está sorprendido por las malas noticias que recibe antes de su fiesta de cumpleaños. (cc)

programme.title: Gridlock'd
programme.desc: Dos drogadictos intentan rehabilitarse, pero el pasado los atormenta. Tupac Shakur, Tim Roth, Thandie Newton, Charles Fleischer. Director: Vondie Curtis Hall. (cc)

programme.title: One Last Hug Three Days at the Grief Camp
programme.desc: Una visita al Campamento Erin, un escape para los niños que están lidiando con la pérdida de un ser querido, con la ayuda de consejeros, voluntarios y otros niños. El campamento fue fundado por el ex jugador de béisbol Jamie Moyer y su esposa, Karen, en memoria de un fan que murió de cáncer a los 17 , y hay más de 40 en todo el país. (cc)

programme.title: Forget Paris
programme.desc: El inestable matrimonio entre un árbitro de baloncesto (Billy Crystal) y una empleada de una línea aérea (Debra Winger) quienes se conocen y se enamoran en Francia

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: Un mujeriego adinerado que parece tenerlo todo, se ve sumergido en una pesadilla en donde la realidad y la fantasía se mezclan, después de sufrir un accidente que lo deja desfigurado

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: Dos hermanos son mordidos por una bestia en Los Ángeles, y poco a poco se convierten en hombres lobo. El director Wes Craven y escritor Kevin Williamson de la película "Scream" vuelven a colaborar para esta obra

programme.title: Fantastic Four Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: Mr. Fantastic (Señor Fantástico), Invisible Woman (La Mujer Invisible), Human Torch (Antorcha Humana) y Thing (Cosa, o Mole) se enfrentan a un misterioso alienígena que anuncia el final del mundo

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: Denzel Washington debuta como director con este drama inspirador, basado en la historia real de un marinero de actitud volátil (Derek Luke) y el psiquiatra compasivo (Washington) que lo ayuda. Adaptada de un guión de Fisher

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: Un mujeriego adinerado que parece tenerlo todo, se ve sumergido en una pesadilla en donde la realidad y la fantasía se mezclan, después de sufrir un accidente que lo deja desfigurado

programme.title: Trabajo
programme.desc: Un niño sordo de 11 años de edad dominicano busca trabajo con el fin de ayudar a su madre soltera, quien pasa por una situación financiera difícil cada mes. (cc)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: El espíritu de un banquero asesinado se queda en la Tierra para proteger a su novia con la ayuda de una psíquica

programme.title: Sirope vivo
programme.desc: Alejandro Sanz le pondrá el toque musical al fin de semana de San Valentín con una transmisión especial de su concierto titulado Sirope Vivo. Esta genial velada fue grabada totalmente en vivo desde el Barclay Card Center de Madrid en septiembre de 2015. (cc)

programme.title: Capadocia
programme.desc: Un brote en Capadocia provoca una discusión entre Teresa e Isabel sobre la mejor manera de parar la violencia; Bambi amenaza con chantajear a Federico si no asegura su transferencia a Capadocia; el intento de una mujer de salvar a su marido de problemas legales fracasa. (cc)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: En el estreno de la segunda temporada, Spencer se enfrenta con un viejo enemigo cuando accede a ser el invitado de un show y termina poniendo en peligro su reputación. Mientras tanto, Ricky está sorprendido por las malas noticias que recibe antes de su fiesta de cumpleaños. (cc)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: Un policía persigue un androide femenino que se escapó de un centro turístico hedonista donde la gente vive sus fantasías más salvajes. Mientras tanto, el propietario del complejo distribuye un grupo de mercenarios para eliminar el androide primero. (cc)

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: Chris Rock dirigió y protagonizó esta comedia romántica acerca de un hombre casado cuyas fantasías de infidelidad son puestas a prueba cuando se encuentra con la ex novia de un amigo. Kerry Washington, Gina Torres, Steve Buscemi, Edward Herrmann

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: (cc)

programme.title: Van Wilder National Lampoon's
programme.desc: Un universitario que ha permanecido en su último curso por siete años inicia un plan para quedarse en la universidad después de que su padre deja de pagar por sus estudios. (cc)

programme.title: Two Brothers
programme.desc: Historia sobre un par de tigres cachoritos que son separados y criados en cautiverio en la Indochina francesa del 1920

programme.title: Soapdish
programme.desc: Las vidas personales de unos actores en una telenovela terminan siendo tan dramáticas como las tramas del programa donde actúan. Sally Field, Kevin Kline, Whoopi Goldberg, Robert Downey Jr

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Una mujer de treinta años, de una familia griega intensamente orgullosa, inicia una relación a escondidas con un profesor americano

programme.title: Sin hijos
programme.desc: Grabriel, un hombre herido por su separación que ocurrió hace cuatro años, siente que la mejor manera de vivir su vida es centrándose en su hija de ocho años, Sofia, y en su trabajo. Sin embargo, Vicky, un antiguo amor platónico de Gabriel, aparece en su vida. Vicky no quiere iniciar una relación con alguien que tenga hijos por lo que Gabriel se las ingenia para que Vicky no sepa que tiene una hija

programme.title: Juan in a Million
programme.desc: Juan Pablo García se despierta el 19 de diciembre y va a su Universidad a entregar la postulación para irse un año de intercambio a Harvard. Vuelve a su casa para tomar una siesta y empezar sus vacaciones de verano. Cuando se despierta se encuentra que la ciudad ha sido abandonada y está totalmente solo. Juan Pablo deberá descubrir por qué la gente se fue de la ciudad, pero aún más importante, porque fue dejado atrás. (cc)

programme.title: Las ovejas no pierden el tren
programme.desc: Lo que les rodea cambia, ellos no. Sin trabajo, sin amor, sin la formación necesaria... Un grupo de amigos cercanos a la cuarentena intenta renovarse y re-direccionar sus vidas al ritmo en que lo hace la sociedad

programme.title: ¿Quién mató a Bambi?
programme.desc: El presidente de la compañía donde trabajan dos amigos, que además también es suegro de uno de ellos, ha aparecido bajo extrañas circunstancias semidesnudo en el maletero de su coche. Decidirán llevarlo sano y salvo a su casa, pero las cosas se complicarán cuando se crucen con dos empresarios al borde de la bancarrota que planean un secuestro... Acabarán secuestrando a la persona equivocada. (cc)

programme.title: Terence Crawford My Fight
programme.desc: Perfil del boxeador del peso wélter junior, Terence Crawford, antes de su cita con Viktor Postol en Las Vegas el próximo 23 de julio. (cc)

programme.title: Magallanes
programme.desc: La vida serena y sin contratiempos de Magallanes da un giro inesperado el día en que Celina, una mujer que había conocido cuando formaba parte del ejército peruano que luchaba contra Sendero Luminoso, se sube a su taxi en pleno centro de Lima. Este reencuentro fortuito, 25 años después del pasado violento que los une, lo impulsará a embarcarse en un arriesgado plan para ayudarla a conseguir dinero y, además, para intentar redimirse por una cuenta pendiente que ya parecía haber olvidado. (cc)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A secret agent recruits a juvenile delinquent into a top-secret spy organisation. Together, they battle a tech genius with diabolical ambitions

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Liam Neeson reunites with Unknown director Jaume Collet-Serra for this Warner Bros. thriller following a mob hit man and his estranged son (Joel Kinnaman) as they flee the wrath of a vengeful crime boss

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: From the Shadows It Watches. Rev. Anderson's powers are tested; Patricia reaches out to Kyle; and Sidney issues a warning

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Incredible biopic of Chris Kyle, the most-celebrated sniper in American military history. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children

programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Off-Air

programme.title: Miami Rhapsody
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a young woman for whom getting engaged is only the first step in a nightmare journey through the relationships minefield. Young advertising copywriter Gwyn Marcus (Sarah Jessica Parker) faces the biggest challenge of her life when she decides to accept the marriage proposal of her boyfriend Matt (Gil Bellows)

programme.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: An impudent inmate is sent from a prison work farm to a mental hospital for psychiatric evaluation. There he leads the patients in rebelling against the tyrannical head nurse

programme.title: The Reaping
programme.desc: Her faith shaken by a family tragedy from which she was never quite able to fully recover, a professor of theology from Louisiana State University moonlighting as a debunker of unexplained religious phenomena finds herself faced with an apocalyptic series of events that seem to reflect the ten plagues of Exodus in director Stephen Hopkins' Southern gothic chiller. The terrified citizens of Haven, LA, have been beset by swarms of locusts and watched as rivers turned to blood. As if that wasn't enough to put the fear of God into any Bible-reading Christian, ominous rumors of a local swamp cult have left many of the small-town citizens turning to prayer for fear that the end is finally nigh. Enter Katherine Winter (Hilary Swank), a skeptical myth-buster and renowned theology scholar with a special knack for spotting religious trickery. Though at first exceedingly confident that she will uncover a human component behind the otherworldly occurrences, Katherine quickly learns that just because one doesn't believe in the supernatural doesn't necessarily mean that it doesn't exist

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet are the lovers aboard the doomed ocean liner in James Cameron's Oscar-winning romantic blockbuster

programme.title: Milk
programme.desc: Sean Penn stars as murdered politician Harvey Milk, the first openly gay man in America to be elected to major public office when he won a seat on the San Francisco Board of Supervisors in 1977

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: Engineer Peter Bowden is snatched by professional terrorists in the South American jungle. While the western hostage negotiators pull out, ex-SAS man Terry Thorne takes the job for Peter's distraught wife Alice. But the rising tension only draws the pair together. Thriller

programme.title: The Number 23
programme.desc: Affable everyman Walter Sparrow is given a second-hand detective novel 'The Number 23' for his birthday, but grows increasingly obsessed with the parallels he sees between his life and that of the book's protagonist

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: From the Shadows It Watches. Rev. Anderson's powers are tested; Patricia reaches out to Kyle; and Sidney issues a warning

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: In this gothic romance set at the turn of the 20th century, a mysterious stranger named Sir Thomas Sharpe (Tom Hiddleston) woos young author Edith Cushing (Mia Wasikowska) and brings her as his bride to his mansion atop a clay mountain in Cumbria, England. There, Edith meets Sharpe's strange and secretive sister Lucille (Jessica Chastain), and learns that her new home holds many disturbing secrets that will force her to fight for her sanity and her very life. Directed by Guillermo del Toro

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: Innocent college student Dakota Johnson begins a relationship with troubled businessman Jamie Dornan. Adaptation of EL James's erotic bestseller. (2015)(120 mins)

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: Set prior to the haunting of the Lambert family, this truly disturbing prequel focuses on a psychic (Lin Shaye) who contacts the dead in order to help a teenage girl (Stefanie Scott) who's being haunted after a botched attempt at connecting with her deceased mother

programme.title: License to Wed
programme.desc: An engaged young couple finds their lifetime of happiness unexpectedly compromised by a pushy minister who insists they successfully complete his comprehensive marriage-prep course before exchanging wedding vows

programme.title: Jackpot
programme.desc: Set 100 miles south of the setting of the Polish brothers' first feature, Twin Falls Idaho, Jackpot tells the story of Sunny Holiday Jon Gries, a down-on-his-luck karaoke dweller who has hopes of becoming a country singer. He has abandoned his feisty wife Bobbi (Daryl Hannah) and young daughter to set off on a nine-month road odyssey with his manager Lester Irving (Garrett Morris), in an effort to collect cash at local karaoke gigs. Lester grooms Sunny by choosing what songs he will do, keeping up with what the judges are like, and negotiating with competitors like Sammy Bones (Mac Davis), another traveling hopeful. On his road journey, he encounters several women, including Janice (Peggy Lipton), a club waitress, and Cheryl (Crystal Bernard), whom he takes home after she has an accident in a restroom, only to find himself being enticed by her underage daughter Tangerine (Camellia Clouse). The road trip comes to a stop, however, when Sunny is pulled over by police who claim that his vehicle is stolen and that Bobbi has reported it. Sunny then seeks refuge with brother Tracy (Anthony Edwards) while he decides his next move. Jackpot is the first released film to be shot with the 24P HDTV camera, which was then blown up to Cinemascope 35 mm format

programme.title: Child 44
programme.desc: A Soviet secret-police agent hunts a serial killer who targets young boys. His investigation later reveals an unsettling conspiracy, which pits him against the ruthless government officials behind it

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Tense thriller about a woman who exposes a web of deceit and murder following her husband's mysterious death. When an art historian's apparently perfect husband is killed in an accident, her recent suspicions about his private activities are confirmed. programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: Victor Salva's superior horror film stars Gina Philips and Justin Long as bickering siblings driving from college across America. Pulling over to investigate a parked truck that had previously tried to run them off the road, they see a strangely garbed figure dumping what looks like a dead body. Investigating, they stumble across an ancient, indestructible horror and look set to become the next victims, unless the advice of psychic Patricia Belcher can save them

programme.title: The Glass House
programme.desc: This teen psychological thriller marks the feature film debut of respected television producer and director Daniel Sackheim. Leelee Sobieski stars as Ruby Baker, a high school student who is devastated when her parents Grace and Dave (Rita Wilson and Michael O'Keefe) are killed in a tragic car accident. With her younger brother Rhett (Trevor Morgan), Ruby is sent to live with the legal guardians chosen by her parents, their best friends Terry (Stellan Skarsgård) and Erin Glass (Diane Lane). The Glasses live in an opulent Malibu mansion where Ruby and Rhett are promised all of the finest luxuries money can buy and a lavish new rich-kid lifestyle. Before long, however, Ruby begins to suspect that her new caretakers are not what they appear on the surface and that the couple's financial woes may force them to harm her or Rhett in order to cash in on their sizable life insurance policies. The Glass House was written by Wesley Strick, screenwriter of Cape Fear (1991), Wolf (1994), and The Saint (1997)

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys create a new form of communication, and extract DNA from Buford's last crisp to help replenish the neighbourhood's dwindling supplies of potatoes.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace teases the boys about the Lake Nose Monster, but becomes scared when she imagines seeing it while on lifeguard duty. When they finally meet the creature, they find it to be gentle and kind.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Stan throws a party to promote his business, and Dipper tries to impress Wendy by cloning himself.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Dipper arranges a showdown with Robbie, and asks a character from his favourite arcade game to help him fight it out. Meanwhile, Mabel tries to cure Stan of his fear of heights.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The stepbrothers create a slow-acting growth hormone, and discover its potential when Candace uses it on herself.

programme.desc: The boys get a new pet goldfish and decide to find it some friends.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: During a visit to London, the family emulates Sherlock Holmes to find out the boys' plans.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Dipper's secret journal pages lead him and the gang to the author's hidden bunker, they find themselves coming face to face with a mysterious figure from Gravity Falls' history.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: After being belittled by Pacifica too many times, Mabel challenges her to a miniature golf-off, which gets out of control when some local residents offer their help.

programme.sub-title: Phineas and Ferb: The OWCA Files.

programme.title: Star vs the Forces of Evil

programme.title: Star vs the Forces of Evil
programme.desc: Marco and friends run up Star's Magic Mirror bill with prank phone calls, so travel to a dimension of pixies to pay it off, and end up working off their debt in the Shard Mines.

programme.title: Star vs the Forces of Evil
programme.desc: When Star sleep spells, Marco tries psychology to cure her. However, it turns out she has been using magic to defend herself from an Interdimensional criminal trying to steal her face.

programme.title: Gravity Falls

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: A new threat requires that Mabel venture into the enchanted realm of the unicorns. Meanwhile, Dipper learns an unexpected twist about the enigmatic Bill Cipher.

programme.desc: The boys dress up as ninjas when their mother asks them to be quiet.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Buford teams up with Doof, which makes life difficult for Perry, whose secret identity is under threat.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys play at being cowboys, but accidentally cause a cattle stampede, and must find a way to round up the animals.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys are given an ice-cream maker, and use the device to cover the garden in a blanket of white.

programme.desc: Part three of four. While Ford discovers Bill's true motives, the Mystery Shack crew forms a plan to fight back.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace borrows the boys' hair-growing machine, but uses it too much and ends up being mistaken for an orang-utan.

programme.desc: The boys are told about a mysterious pirate named Badbeard while on a camping trip with their grandfather, and decide to set out on a swashbuckling adventure of their own.
